buildoptions.name: install_umask
buildoptions.description: Default umask to apply on permissions of installed files

buildoptions.name: backend_max_links
buildoptions.description: Maximum number of linker processes to run or 0 for no limit

buildoptions.name: b_staticpic
buildoptions.description: Build static libraries as position independent

buildoptions.name: c_args
buildoptions.description: Extra arguments passed to the C compiler

buildoptions.name: c_link_args
buildoptions.description: Extra arguments passed to the C linker

buildoptions.name: cpp_args
buildoptions.description: Extra arguments passed to the C++ compiler

buildoptions.name: cpp_link_args
buildoptions.description: Extra arguments passed to the C++ linker

buildoptions.name: build-tests
buildoptions.description: Build unit tests. Currently this will build *all* unit tests, which may build more than expected.

buildoptions.name: dri-drivers
buildoptions.description: List of dri drivers to build. If this is set to auto all drivers applicable to the target OS/architecture will be built

buildoptions.name: dri-drivers-path
buildoptions.description: Location to install dri drivers. Default: $libdir/dri.

buildoptions.name: dri-search-path
buildoptions.description: Locations to search for dri drivers, passed as colon separated list. Default: dri-drivers-path.

buildoptions.name: gallium-drivers
buildoptions.description: List of gallium drivers to build. If this is set to auto all drivers applicable to the target OS/architecture will be built

buildoptions.name: gallium-extra-hud
buildoptions.description: Enable HUD block/NIC I/O HUD status support

buildoptions.name: gles2
buildoptions.description: Build support for OpenGL ES 2.x and 3.x

buildoptions.name: glx-read-only-text
buildoptions.description: Disable writable .text section on x86 (decreases performance)

buildoptions.name: omx-libs-path
buildoptions.description: path to put omx libraries. defaults to omx-bellagio pkg-config pluginsdir.

buildoptions.name: osmesa-bits
buildoptions.description: Number of channel bits for OSMesa.

buildoptions.name: platforms
buildoptions.description: window systems to support. If this is set to `auto`, all platforms applicable will be enabled.

buildoptions.name: shader-cache
buildoptions.description: Build with on-disk shader cache support

buildoptions.name: shared-glapi
buildoptions.description: Whether to build a shared or static glapi

buildoptions.name: shared-llvm
buildoptions.description: Whether to link llvm shared or statically.

buildoptions.name: swr-arches
buildoptions.description: Architectures to build SWR support for.

buildoptions.name: tools
buildoptions.description: List of tools to build. (Note: `intel-ui` selects `intel`)

buildoptions.name: va-libs-path
buildoptions.description: path to put va libraries. defaults to $libdir/dri.

buildoptions.name: vdpau-libs-path
buildoptions.description: path to put vdpau libraries. defaults to $libdir/vdpau.

buildoptions.name: vulkan-drivers
buildoptions.description: List of vulkan drivers to build. If this is set to auto all drivers applicable to the target OS/architecture will be built

buildoptions.name: vulkan-icd-dir
buildoptions.description: Location relative to prefix to put vulkan icds on install. Default: $datadir/vulkan/icd.d

buildoptions.name: xvmc-libs-path
buildoptions.description: path to put xvmc libraries. defaults to $libdir.

buildoptions.name: errorlogs
buildoptions.description: Whether to print the logs from failing tests

buildoptions.name: stdsplit
buildoptions.description: Split stdout and stderr in test logs
